website_summaries.verdict: A very good active brace that is hard to beat for comfort and basic support. The best value for your money.
pros: Great fit, breathable, and provides very good knee support without putting pressure on it
cons: The straps securing the brace are a bit thin

customer_reviews.title: Non returnable
customer_reviews.text: Firstly, this cannot be returned. My fault i didn’t realize that. It bunched up behind my knee and slid down, whether i wore it directly on my knee or over my pants. I found out i prefer a brace with a hole in the front. I had my meniscus cleaned out about 1 1/2 yrs. Ago and still experience knee pain and swelling. I also have a bakers cyst that will fill up with fluid depending on how much I aggravate my knee. Other sleeves seem to have helped keep my knee compressed, which has immensely helped with the pain.
customer_reviews.author: babysham

customer_reviews.title: T
customer_reviews.text: This is a very useful product. The knee brace works well. One has to be cautious about not setting it on the limb too tightly, because the velgro grips are tenacious and hold well. It has taken the place of my hard brace for the time being until i get knee replacement surgery. It is good for travel and does not set off alarms like the hard brace. I will be interested to see how it wears over the course of a year or so. will the Velcro start to give out, is this product washable? These are questions I have not dealt with so far. I think that is also slightly over priced.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Brenna

customer_reviews.title: Quality Device for Those with Knee Challenges
customer_reviews.text: Certainly a well-made, quality product, good packaging, decent price. IMHO, different people will have varying rates of success, depending upon the problem with their knee, the outcome of knee surgery (if any), how long they wear it, whether they can run or walk, etc. For me, the results were pretty good as long as I do not overdo the usage time. I would think this product would help many people better adjust to their personal situation.
customer_reviews.author: DLC SoCal

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and supportive.
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome, comfortable and easy to put on brace. I had a Bakers cist on the back of my left knee and decided to use support while hiking. Because my left knee was compromised I felt it would be smart to also support the right knee for added support so as to not favor one over the other. You can ware this brace over or under your cloths. There is no scratching, chaffing, slipping or bunching. I have a new bounce to my step, no fear of injury, long walks are a pleasure. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: william s calkins

customer_reviews.title: Its okay
customer_reviews.text: Nothing works perfect but this is the best out of all that I've tried so far. I'm a bigger girl so one size doesnt usually work for me. I've had this brace for a week now and the top is already sliding but the middle and the bottom hold up just fine. I just have to roll the top back up every so often. It does have good support. Even when the top slips down I still feel like my knee is held together. My only major complain is that it does get hot an sweaty so I do have to take it off periodically through the day.
customer_reviews.author: Crows Finds

customer_reviews.title: Two Thumbs Down
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this product did not work for me. I have really large knees so the "one size fits all" concept did not work. I had trouble wrapping the brace around my knee using the fasteners and the fasteners rubbed against my other leg. I tried several times to adjust the brace but to no avail. I was disappointed especially since it had good reviews. Back to the drawing board for me.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: 🌟🌟🌟🌟⭐️
customer_reviews.text: I had to buy this for knee support while doing squats and was amazed by the very design which provides ample knee support .The design with straps makes this the best knee wrap in its class .It’s a great product for either simple walks ,runs ,lifting weights or ding simple daily chores . I would recommend this to people who have an active lifestyle as well as to those who are looking for a simply easy best kneee support .
customer_reviews.author: farrukh

customer_reviews.title: This really helped me walk
customer_reviews.text: I twisted my knee a week before going on a vacation that required a lot of walking. I wore the Neo G knee brace while walking, without a brace I wouldn't have been able to walk the vacation. I dinged it a star because the velcro straps are not working as well when I received it. The material seems to be wearing out in spots. This thing worked great in every other aspect , it was easy to put on, I wore it comfortably for many ours. It kept my strained ligament in position. It was a worthwhile purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Walter P Watson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support.
customer_reviews.text: Knee brace is great!! Not sure exactly what’s wrong with my knee but knew or needed support. Was going on a trip where there would be lots of walking. Brace worked extremely well in giving me support. I could do everything and know I would not have been able to without it. Material seems good. Washed it upon my return as I was in a hot city. Washed well. The material isn’t thick but it doesn’t work with tight pants. Recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: K. Harrison

customer_reviews.title: Not the advertised product
customer_reviews.text: This is not what was advertised. It’s not closed at all. The open part at the knee and behind knee bunches up and offers no support. Now it says it’s not eligible for return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One size does NOT fit all
customer_reviews.text: This did not fit me at all. I believe it was universal but the first was not good. I’m an athletic 5-5 female. I wanted to use this for support due to a meniscus tear. I couldn’t use this at all. I tried to return it but got the run around and it wasn’t user friendly to return. I gave up and now stuck with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be more satisfied with this knee support--great value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I''m in my late 50s and have developed knee sensitivity if I stand for long periods or walk more than a block. I found these knee supports and gave them a try--from the moment I put them on I felt relief. They go on and off super easily with the Velcro and can be adjusted for comfort in one second. With this knee support on, I have been able to stand longer and walk farther with no pain. The comfort begins for me as soon I put them on, and having it on is also a gentle reminder to me to be extra careful going up and down stairs and curbs.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Calabro

customer_reviews.title: Fine, nothing special
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust pressure. Not overly restrictive. Like any brace, very hot. Stability is decent but it wouldn't compensate for a serious knee issue.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Hornbeck

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality and does not accept returns!!
customer_reviews.text: This provides minimal support,wrinkles up when worn,and stretches out in spite of being able to adjust the Velcro. I did not realize the seller does not take returns,which is very disappointing to be stuck with a poor product.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea deBuzna

customer_reviews.title: Super supportive knee brace
customer_reviews.text: I have used a number of knee braces. This one is comfortable and effective. Prepare to sweat, but it is so good, I would still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: violet

customer_reviews.title: this is a great brace. i fell down the stairs and now ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a great brace. i fell down the stairs and now likely have a torn meniscus according to orthped. this really helps with walking so knee doesn't "catch" all the time. It's adjustable which helps when swollen. I highly recommend this for anyone with knee pain or injury.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri N.

customer_reviews.title: No seams to cut circulation
customer_reviews.text: Looked for a brace without a top and bottom heavy seam. They always cut off my circulation. This brace doesn't I'll probably order another.
customer_reviews.author: charlie

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Was a little confused how to put it on as it appears to have a knee cap opening & the pic doesnt. But its easy to rearrange until you get it where you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great brace for the price.
customer_reviews.text: The Velcro works pretty well which lets you cinch the brace tightly for pretty good support. I haven't had it long enough to attest to the longevity of the velcro. Only negative would be it doesn't seem to breath at all, but most supports are the same.
customer_reviews.author: Tracyd

customer_reviews.title: Good support for people who have minor knee problems.
customer_reviews.text: It is very comfortable but provides little support for my knee, I only wear it while sleeping. Because my knee is in such bad shape I have to wear a brace with steel reinforcement during the day when I am up and about. I think this support would be very good for people who do not have a really bad knee.
customer_reviews.author: Vietnam Vet

customer_reviews.title: Great kneee support
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He says it makes his knee feel much better while at work. It fits great and is very comfortable. Well made product. He is planning on getting a few more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Same as a lot of others
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, good support. Does not breathe, wet from sweat without exertion.
customer_reviews.author: Jquedup

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: It's just what I was looking for, an adjustable knee brace. It feels good on, it's easy to wash and it feels good on my arthritic knee. After extended wear it tends to make my leg sweat a bit, but that's usually at the end of the day when I'm ready to remove it.
customer_reviews.author: L. Gibson

customer_reviews.title: good brace
customer_reviews.text: material gets kinda stinky after a couple days. But a wash gets rid of it
customer_reviews.author: Stephen J.

customer_reviews.title: Knee support
customer_reviews.text: This works for me because it’s comfortable and easy to adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Gifford

customer_reviews.title: Works well with knee pain
customer_reviews.text: I use it after workouts and my knee pain is minimal. It provides the support I need and helps a lot. Would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: K. W K R

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not a fan of the strap behind my knee and they make me sweat more the my other one's
customer_reviews.author: RDH

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I SAID GOOD, I MEAN GREAT, WHEN WORKING IN THE YARD OR WASHING THE CAR MUST PUT IT ON
customer_reviews.author: anthony purificato

customer_reviews.title: Great braces
customer_reviews.text: These knee braces are great no silicone to keep them in place, i am allergic to silicone. The wraps leave room for you knee to bend so when putting them on keep that I’m mind you might have to pull up or turn to get exact placement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. Very good quality and comfortable. Works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price point.
customer_reviews.text: It's clearly the best knee support for the price. Over time, and with a couple of hand washings, the velcro loses some of its grip on the fabric, and an edge of the velcro has to be tucked around and inside, to retain a secure bond, during a workout. But would I buy this again? Yes, I would.
customer_reviews.author: Dion Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Helps my knee
customer_reviews.text: It seems to be well constructed, which is a problem we’ve had with other braces. It’s fairly lightweight and with the Florida weather, that’s important.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Vilar

customer_reviews.title: "Item is not returnable"
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware, you cannot return this item if you want/need to. I tried and the Amazon screen tells me "this item is not returnable". Ridiculous. Doesn't fit right, it's too big and bulky. Now I'm stuck with 2.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: When adjusted correctly this brace provides the arthritic relief looked ...
customer_reviews.text: When adjusted correctly this brace provides the arthritic relief looked for. That said, getting the brace properly adjusted is not as simple as expected.
customer_reviews.author: DANIEL L HYSAN

customer_reviews.title: It was not perfect, but allowed me to keep moving
customer_reviews.text: I twisted my knee getting off my horse. Went to go jogging and it was a non event. Visited the Ortho doc and he said get a brace and let it heal. Picked up the Neo G and went on my 4.5 mile run with some skepticism. To my surprise it worked. It was not perfect, but allowed me to keep moving. I highly recommend you see your doctor first, If he or she recommends a brace, this one works!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Chatfield

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this knee brace
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this knee brace, I had surgery like 4years ago torn meniscus, I do high impact cardio and wear this brace, love it.!
customer_reviews.author: Prissy916

customer_reviews.title: Pointless
customer_reviews.text: It loos fine but after 2 days it started falling down meaning not useful at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good support
customer_reviews.text: I have osteoarthritis in my knee and injured it few weeks ago when wearing this knee support I am able to walk and stand for a long time. It support the knee very well, I do recommend it to others with knee problems.
customer_reviews.author: brenda banks

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't slip
customer_reviews.text: Fits well. Doesn't slip. Hard to say how much it helps but I'll keep wearing it on long hikes.
customer_reviews.author: James S. Sarapata

customer_reviews.title: It supports
customer_reviews.text: I bought the knee brace for my mother, she says she loves it ,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It may cause skin irritation
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, but apparently I'm one of those folks whose skin does not like neoprene. Also, I'm not sure if "one size fits all" is apt, because I found the brace to be pretty snug. I am overweight, so it would be helpful if it came in different sizes.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Giaimo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great knee brace, comfortable, cool, and helps keep knee stable
customer_reviews.author: njcrutch

customer_reviews.title: Good Customization
customer_reviews.text: Besides support and comfort, this knee brace works well with different shapes of legs and knees. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: Chery

customer_reviews.title: GREAT KNEE BRACE FOR A LOW COST!
customer_reviews.text: I have triple X sized knees and upper thigh muscle and needed the NEO G wrap around knee brace that is easy to put on and take off with just the right amount of firm knee ball support for a very reasonable price. I plan on buying another one for my other knee.
customer_reviews.author: Arthur Grant

customer_reviews.title: Effective but frustrating
customer_reviews.text: The Neo G Closed Knee Brace is comfortable and effective but keeps sliding off my knee and down my leg after I have walked for a few minutes; that is why I gave it 4 stars rather than 5.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis M Howard

customer_reviews.title: Good value with comfort
customer_reviews.text: As advertised it provides good joint support. My only suggestion might be to increase lateral stability. It works well in providing moderate support. I think it is a good value and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Thankyouverymuch

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, Flexible, Good Support
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Hard to find one with a closed knee. This is everything I looked for: firm, flexible, comfortable, and good support. The only reason for 4 stars is that the Velcro stops sticking after a few months of use. This is common. I had the same problem with a similar support. I purchased this in January and I am now needing to purchase another.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M Lavely

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointing. Not worth the money. Not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable while working. I’m returning this item. I was very disappointed with it. I’m a nurse and was hoping to get relief from my knee pain. Not what I hoped for. I would rate this a negative star if I had the choice.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Not as well made as previous purchase
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had bought more of these when I purchased an open patella brand a year ago. The closed ones I just purchased have straps only a fraction of length from previous purchase which make them slip down more often than longer straps.
customer_reviews.author: TRACY M.

customer_reviews.title: this is a great knee brace although the strap that goes behind the ...
customer_reviews.text: this is a great knee brace although the strap that goes behind the knee is a bit uncomfortabe at times
customer_reviews.author: kathy dar

customer_reviews.title: Helped my MCL tear
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and supportive for my MCL tear. Much more so than anything from the drug store.
customer_reviews.author: Abby Frances

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and helps a lot
customer_reviews.text: This got high ratings on line. Very comfortable and helps a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Dougan

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit-No Slip
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a comfortable knee brace that fits. This brace is completely adjustable and best of all, once I put it on in the morning it stays in place for the whole day; minimal bunching behind the knee and no more pulling and tugging on a brace that tries to slip down. It does keep my knee warm, but that's a good thing. I just bought my second one and recommend it to anyone who wants comfortable, put-it-on-and-forget-it support for a weak/injured knee.
customer_reviews.author: Judy S. Short

customer_reviews.title: Jumpers knee and this helps.
customer_reviews.text: Good support, breathes, comfortable almost all day. I have jumpers knee. It doesn't restore lost power but it curbs the pain significantly.
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Need support, this is for you!
customer_reviews.text: When I exercise or will be walking a lot , this is my go to.
customer_reviews.author: catherine robinson

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this product for anyone with knee problems
customer_reviews.text: These work well. I would recommend this product for anyone with knee problems.
customer_reviews.author: W.E Walker

customer_reviews.title: An excellent product
customer_reviews.text: This product has been a lifesaver. It has enabled me to continue all my activities while maintaining a comfort and stability.
customer_reviews.author: Susan F. Merriam

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me.
customer_reviews.text: Irritated leg, behind my knee. I adjusted it but it didn’t help. Support was ok.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Sue

customer_reviews.title: Will not purchase these items again the original one I purchased from Walgreens has a better fit.
customer_reviews.text: items does not fit properly, uncomfortable on leg most of the time. Will not purchase these items again the original one I purchased from Walgreens has a better fit. .
customer_reviews.author: ORGSHRBRT

customer_reviews.title: All good as long as you don't put it in washing machine
customer_reviews.text: I like to clean everything so I put mine in the washing machines. The fibers come off and the velcro strap does not fasten anymore. Other than that, its great
customer_reviews.author: BGK

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I works for me....I can get hot after wearing it for more that an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Now & Then

customer_reviews.title: The braces work
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the price and they do what they are suppose to!
customer_reviews.author: robert mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: Great wrap. Have huge legs (I like heavy squats)
customer_reviews.text: Great wrap. Have huge legs (I like heavy squats). Fits on well, slip is minimal. Great for keeping knee warm.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Graham

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: One size fits all does not always work out, especially with my small stature. Too bulky and sloppy fitting.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Soga

customer_reviews.title: Good knee brace
customer_reviews.text: I love this brace. I can make it as tight as I want and still feels comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: ninja2

customer_reviews.title: not as good aside hoped
customer_reviews.text: difficult to put on and take off. no instructions bulky under pants
customer_reviews.author: alene cohen

customer_reviews.title: fit well, but more support was where the "straps" ...
customer_reviews.text: fit well, but more support was where the "straps" fit than the knee itself...also very warm for summer use...got really sweatty....not sure if it can be washed
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Really Helps
customer_reviews.text: Works great for my pain and being on my feet a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jax's Mom

customer_reviews.title: It does work better than most
customer_reviews.text: It does work better than most. I'm a small person who has had 2 knee replacements, and have worn many braces. I wish they would make smaller in length and thickness for small people
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Don't like it.
customer_reviews.text: This brace actually made my knee hurt more!!!! It is also very hot. Don't like it.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Bartels

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Knee Brace
customer_reviews.text: Simply, the best, most comfortable knee brace I have ever used. My knee feels better than it has in ages. Never again will I be buying a knee brace off the rack at my local drug store.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Lustig

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I read all of the reviews & thought it would fit. I could not get the straps around my knee. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little support
customer_reviews.text: The product offers little support. The cheap brace from CVS is better.
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Vitale

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Very comfortable. Isn't too pricey. I would definitely purchase this brace again. Also helps me maintain my balance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hubby Likes alot!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my 59 yr old husband, who just recently completed a cardio-rehab exercise program. We both are trying to walk and exercise more. This is real strong support, for moderate to fast exercise. It will hold a bad knee joint during long work hours on feet or fast paced exercise. It is not light or small, I would not were this for regular daily support.
customer_reviews.author: MJCAT002

customer_reviews.title: It is pretty basic, but does the job
customer_reviews.text: This brace was just what I needed! It is pretty basic, but does the job. The Velcro allows for size adjustment and comfort.
customer_reviews.author: nstephens

customer_reviews.title: booooo
customer_reviews.text: fit was not comfortable and was not able to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft fabric felt good around injured knee
customer_reviews.text: Soft fabric felt good around injured knee. Very firm support. Fit well. Velcro closure holds well. Would buy this support again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Best neoprene brace
customer_reviews.text: One of the best neoprene braces I have had easy to adjust tightness can go all day before removing. I would recommend if you don't need lateral struts

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works good for the short time I need it occasionally for support.

customer_reviews.title: Knee support
customer_reviews.text: These wrap around knee supports were just what I needed, they supply an excellent aide to my aching knees, allowing me to climb stairs with a much less pain. They answered my needs perfectly.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My Mother in Law is who I got it for
customer_reviews.author: Carol p.& co.🚗🚗🚗

customer_reviews.title: Feels great
customer_reviews.text: It's a wonderful knee brace! It fits perfectly and it's very comfortable. I've already used it while I'm at my soccer games. And the holes that are attached to the knee brace. I didn't feel any sweat at all while I was playing. It's a extremely good knee brace!! I highly recommended this knee brace for anybody who has knee problems.

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It works well, easy to use. I use it during an aerobic exercise class on a weak knee and have no pain during or after.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brace work fine but velcro straps loose some of their adhesive strength ...
customer_reviews.text: Brace work fine but velcro straps loose some of their adhesive strength over a period of time.

customer_reviews.title: Offers no support for your knee
customer_reviews.text: This brace is cheap and flimsy and offers no support for your knee. If you have knee issues, buy a different brace.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Dwyer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Once I started wearing this brace my knee problems we gone.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit well. Cheaply made and offered little to no support
customer_reviews.author: randy ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Best brace for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best brace for the price. very comfortable, wore it all day at work and easy to remove and put on>
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good knee support
customer_reviews.text: My Grandmother says it fit her and is helping her move around.
customer_reviews.author: SQTen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product for good price.. I am large and its fits!
customer_reviews.author: bfkguy

customer_reviews.title: Solid support and great comfort. Definitely good value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for! Solid support and great comfort. Definitely good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew J. Mull

customer_reviews.title: Helpful
customer_reviews.text: My mom has osteoarthritis in both knees. It helps a lot. She was able to walk several blocks thanks to the support. So it's definitely a keep.
customer_reviews.author: NS S.

customer_reviews.title: Has 3 Adjustable Straps to Fit Most Any Leg
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this brace for landscaping work on my hilly property. It helps stabilize the knee on my weaker leg so that it is not as subject to torque when I dig. I like that it has 3 straps that can be adjusted, so I could use it for either knee. Nothing fancy, but seems to do the job. Haven't washed it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Chrys Barnes

customer_reviews.title: works as expected
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and gives nice level of support for walking.
customer_reviews.author: jon carter

customer_reviews.title: the one made by ACE is much better.
customer_reviews.text: not enoufh support. the one made by ACE is much better.
customer_reviews.author: howard

customer_reviews.title: Velcro
customer_reviews.text: This brace would be wonderful if they could find a way to extend the life of the velcro, or replace it with something else. My velcro is curled and I've had this for less than 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Memberx23

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT FIT UP TO 22" CIRCUMFERENCE - Inaccurate Measurements - See Photo
customer_reviews.text: The description says to measure 4" above your knee and that the item will fit up to 22". However, it's TOO SMALL. And if you lay the item out flat, and use a measuring tape, it measures ONLY 21 INCHES to the very tip of the Velcro for the thigh, and ONLY 18 INCHES for the knee. If it's going to fit a 22" circumference, then the length should BE 22 inches, not including the velcro since the velcro needs to overlap the opposite end. I'm bummed because this item was soft and would've been very comfortable if the measurements were right. And despite the inaccuracy of the description to the actual product, there's no option to return the item.
customer_reviews.author: JenniferRaeS

customer_reviews.title: my knees are in bad shape! The Neo G braces have significantly reduced ...
customer_reviews.text: Both of my knees are "bone on bone." In addition, both knees suffer from severe ostecoarthritis, degenerative-type tearing of the medial meniscus, etc. In simple English, my knees are in bad shape! The Neo G braces have significantly reduced the pain I experience from standing, getting up from a chair, walking, etc. I love them! I wear the braces during the day and take them off at night. The braces can't fix my knees but they have improved the quality of my life, by allowing me to do things now that I could not do before without experiencing severe pain.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent F. Leonard

customer_reviews.title: Brace Yourself for a Supportive Walk
customer_reviews.text: Love this knee brace as it hugs and supports my weak leg allowing me to walk farther than I otherwise would be able to. It's fairly flexible, but I sometimes loosen the top Velcro if I sit with the brace attached. The brace does heat up the the leg, but that serves to relax the muscles. It is easy to wear and wrap around your knee. If there is a downside, it would be that the area of the brace the Velcro attaches to wears out eventually, but that's they way any Velcro attachment works. This is a great brace and it doesn't aggravate my kneecap.
customer_reviews.author: Beth

product_meta.title: Neo G Closed Knee Brace - Support for Arthritis, Joint Pain, Meniscus Pain, Knee Injuries, Recovery, Rehabilitation - Adjustable Compression - Class 1 Medical Device - One Size - Blue
feature_bullets: PERFECT KNEE BRACE FOR ACTIVE LIFESTYLES: Premium quality brace featuring non-slip design for ultimate comfort and support, suitable for everyday activities and sports including running, golf, football, basketball, soccer, hiking, walking & many more

PAIN RELIEVING KNEE SUPPORT: Medically engineered to help relieve pain associated with arthritis, aching joints, as well as aid recovery from meniscus injuries, minor tendon and ligament injuries. Reduces stress and strain, providing stability to weak and injured knees

MEDICAL GRADE: Registered internationally as a Class 1 Medical Device with regulatory bodies, such as the FDA (US), Health Canada & the MHRA (UK). Manufactured to the highest quality and compliant standards, Neo G is also the official Partner of The Chartered Society of Physiotherapy (UK equivalent of the American Physical Therapy Association)
CLOSED PATELLA DESIGN & PREMIUM GRADE NEOPRENE: The brace offers adjustable compression to the knee complex without restricting movement. The heat therapeutic neoprene helps warm muscles and joints

ONE SIZE AND FULLY ADJUSTABLE COMPRESSION FOR BEST FIT: Universal size (one size fits most), fits the Left or Right knee and is Unisex suitable for men and women. The adjustable compression system ensures blood flow safety, giving support to the affected area
